lines.text: Right-hand rule indicates direction of field
Point thumb in direction of conventional current
Curled fingers show direction of magnetic field

secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:actsec_pz99:Experiment] with magnetic fields created by electric currents.
2. Describe the [OBJ:expsec_q771:magnetic fields created by electric currents]. Determine the direction of current in a magnetic field using the right-hand rule.
3. Determine the [OBJ:expsec_q772:force] between two current-carrying wires.
4. Apply the concept of magnetic fields induced by electric currents to [OBJ:expsec_q769:electric motors].
5. Describe [OBJ:expsec_q770:commutators].
